name: Travel Shopper Agent
description: A travel booking assistant that helps users find and book flights using AP2 for secure payments

extensions.description: This agent can make payments on behalf of users via the AP2 protocol

skills.name: Search Flights
skills.description: Search for available flights from merchant agents

skills.name: Book Flight
skills.description: Book a flight with secure AP2 payment authorization

skills.name: Manage Preferences
skills.description: View and manage user travel preferences
